About Automic's Ansible Package ================================
Automating the integration with ansible through automic actions. Ansible package supports the following functionalities. * Execute the Ansible command Moreover this can be used to run ansible playbooks as well.
=Setup= * Ansible should be installed on master node (Ubuntu/Linux). * Automic UNIX Agent should be up and running on master node. * Automic UNIX Agent should be able to run the ansible commands. * Login Object should be created in Automation Engine and corresponding user should have read/write and execute privileges on agent working directory.
=Actions= Following actions are supported for Ansible.
* Action Name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ANSIBLE.PUB.ACTION.EXEC_ANSIBLE_CMD Action Description: This action is used to execute the Ansible command.
